summary: This is an email exchange regarding the appointment of counsel for an upcoming Tuesday hearing in the Epstein case, involving a courtroom deputy and an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Judith C. McCarthy
persons.context: The Honorable Judge McCarthy is the presiding judge for the U.S. District Court, Southern District of New York, in White Plains, where the appointment of counsel is being scheduled.

events.title: Appointment of counsel hearing
events.description: A hearing is scheduled for an upcoming Tuesday to appoint counsel, as coordinated via email between court staff and prosecutors.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated June 22, 2018, concerning legal proceedings in the Epstein case.
It involves scheduling for the appointment of counsel for an upcoming Tuesday hearing.
The correspondence is between a courtroom deputy for Judge Judith C. McCarthy and an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York.
The hearing is set to take place at the U.S. District Court in White Plains, NY.
The document references a 'Conflicts List' with identifier EFTA00094673.
